mapper.sql: d.id, name, tags, locate, d.about, user_id, create_time, last_active, d.status
mapper.insert:
insert into device
id,
name,
tags,
locate,
about,
user_id,
create_time,
last_active,
status,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update device
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tags = #{tags,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
locate = #{locate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
about = #{about,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
last_active = #{lastActive,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update device set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tags = #{tags,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, locate = #{locate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, about = #{about,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, last_active = #{lastActive,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
